summary: An ordinance establishing, modifying and abrogating certain positions in the Police, Engineering, Water, Executive, Health, Park, Lighting, Law, Civil Service and Building Depts. and in the office of the Employees' Retirement System and the Municipal Court; fixing compensations; superseding the 1961 Salary Ordinance (89800) insofar as in conflict and providing funds by appropriation, budget item transfers and a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
